section.title: Timetable Information
section.para: The user timetable can be viewed as either a list of sessions or as a month or calendar view. The timetable will display all classes on a given day, by clicking on a given day the session information will display at the bottom of the page, including course name, room, venue and tutor information. Timetables are applicable either to classes a student is enrolled in, or to sessions being taught by a tutor.

section.title: Calendar Subscriptions
section.para: Skills onCourse allows both Students and Tutors to subscribe to a Calendar for their Classes. To add this Calendar feed to your own Calendar, simply click on the Subscribe to Calendarbutton within the portal then add this to your own Calendar.
Once the subscription has been set, any amendments made to the timetable for the Classes you are either teaching or enrolled in will automatically flow through to your Calendar.

caption.para: URL link generated by the Portal which can be added to your own Calendar

section.title: Class information
section.para: Students can access up to date class information such as the date of the next session, venue and room information, as well as a link through to the Class Description which outlines the content to be covered within the Class.
Tutors are also able to access Class information, including total number of enrolments, venue and room information.

caption.para: Tutors can access detailed class information via the skillsOnCourse portal

tip.para: Despite Tutors and Students both accessing the skills onCourse via the same log in page, the information displayed to these two groups is different.

section.title: Getting Directions to a Classroom
section.para: The skills OnCourse class detail view provides a link to Google maps, providing detailed directions for getting to the venue. Simply click on the View on Maplink within the Class details view.

imagedata.fileref: images/Tutor Portal Classes Menu Location Tab.png

caption.para: Students can access Google Map directions via the skillsonCourse portal

section.title: Manage Waiting Lists and Mailing Lists
section.para: A student can view what waiting lists they are on by clicking on Subsciptions -> Waiting List. This page with allow you to find out more information about the waiting lists you are subscribed to along with the option of deleting your name off that list.

imagedata.fileref: images/Tutor Portal Subscriptions Menu Waiting Lists.png

section.para: A student can view what mailing lists they are being subscribed to by clicking on Subscriptions -> Mailing Lists. You have the option of choosing what method you would like to received the information by (E-mail, SMS, Post) and which of the designated mailing lists you wish to subscribe to.

caption.para: Add or remove yourself from Mailing Lists
